items.content_html: Fast-Web-Kit is a collection of utilities and functions that simplify common development tasks, allowing developers to write applications more quickly and efficiently. items.content_html: LiveValidateJS is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides real-time form validation and input checking for HTML forms.
